title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 30.11 - Plate surrender
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 30.11 - Plate surrender

State Regulations

Registrants with fleet registered vehicles shall surrender
the plates in any issuing office or central point established by the Department
of Motor Vehicles when required by these regulations or when the registrations
are not renewed. If the registrant does not surrender the plates when required
to do so, the registrant shall be required to continue to pay registration fees
for such vehicle or vehicles until such surrender occurs. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
30.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
